mapper.sql: DID, REGION_SEQ, FEP_IP, FEP_PORT, DCU_IP, DCU_PORT, MAC_A, MAC_B, MAC_C, ITIME, FWV, WAN_CODE, COMM_CODE, T_MASK, SM_P, SMLP_P, GMLP_P, EAMLP_P, GM_AVE_VA_P, GM_INST_VA_P, EAM_INST_VA_P, F_BUILD, P_LENGTH, TIME_OUT, TRAP_INTERVAL, E_MTIME_ERROR_LIMIT, G_MTIME_ERROR_LIMIT, EA_MTIME_ERROR_LIMIT, EM_TIME_P, GM_TIME_P, EAM_TIME_P, CPU_RESET_ENUM, PINID, ACODE_RO, ACODE_RW, SNMP_PW_RO, SNMP_PW_RW, WDATE
mapper.select: select REG.AREA1, REG.AREA2, REG.AREA3 , (case when METER.COUNT is null then '0' else METER.COUNT END) as METER_COUNT , DCU.* from DCU_INFO DCU left join(select L4.SEQ , L2.RNAME as AREA1 , L3.RNAME as AREA2 , L4.RNAME as AREA3 from REGION as L1 join REGION as L2 on L1.SEQ = L2.PID join REGION as L3 on L2.SEQ = L3.PID join REGION as L4 on L3.SEQ = L4.PID) REG on DCU.REGION_SEQ = REG.SEQ left join(select DID, count(*) as COUNT from METER_INFO group by did) METER on DCU.DID = METER.DID
